verses.verse: The <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> with the <S%G4523>Sadducees<s%> <S%G4334>came,<s%> and <S%G3985>tempting<s%> <S%G1905>desired<s%> him that he would <S%G1925>show<s%> them a <S%G4592>sign<s%> from <S%G3772>heaven.<s%>

He <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, When it is <S%G3798>evening,<s%> you say, <S%G3004><s%> It will be <S%G2105>fair<s%> <S%G2105>weather:<s%> for the <S%G3772>sky<s%> is red. <S%G4449><s%>

And in the morning, <S%G4404><s%> It will be <S%G5494>foul<s%> <S%G5494>weather<s%> to <S%G4594>day:<s%> for the <S%G3772>sky<s%> is <S%G4449>red<s%> and <S%G4768>lowering.<s%> O you <S%G5273>hypocrites,<s%> you <S%G1097>can<s%> <S%G1252>discern<s%> the <S%G4383>face<s%> of the <S%G3772>sky;<s%> but <S%G1410>can<s%> you not discern the <S%G4592>signs<s%> of the times? <S%G2540><s%>

A <S%G4190>wicked<s%> and <S%G3428>adulterous<s%> <S%G1074>generation<s%> <S%G1934>seeks<s%> <S%G1934>after<s%> a <S%G4592>sign;<s%> and there shall <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G4592>sign<s%> be <S%G1325>given<s%> to it, but the <S%G4592>sign<s%> of the <S%G4396>prophet<s%> Jonas. <S%G2495><s%> And he <S%G2641>left<s%> them, and <S%G565>departed.<s%>
And when his <S%G3101>disciples<s%> were <S%G2064>come<s%> to the <S%G4008>other<s%> <S%G4008>side,<s%> they had <S%G1950>forgotten<s%> to <S%G2983>take<s%> <S%G740>bread.<s%>

<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, Take <S%G3708>heed<s%> and <S%G4337>beware<s%> of the <S%G2219>leaven<s%> of the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> and of the Sadducees. <S%G4523><s%>
And they <S%G1260>reasoned<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G1438>themselves,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> It is <S%G3754>because<s%> we have <S%G2983>taken<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G740>bread.<s%>

Which when <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1097>perceived,<s%> he <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, O you of <S%G3640>little<s%> <S%G3640>faith,<s%> <S%G5101>why<s%> <S%G1260>reason<s%> you <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G1438>yourselves,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> you have <S%G2192>brought<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> bread? <S%G740><s%>

Do you not <S%G3768>yet<s%> <S%G3539>understand,<s%> <S%G3761>neither<s%> <S%G3421>remember<s%> the <S%G4002>five<s%> <S%G740>loaves<s%> of the <S%G4000>five<s%> <S%G4000>thousand,<s%> and <S%G4214>how<s%> <S%G4214>many<s%> <S%G2894>baskets<s%> you <S%G2983>took<s%> up?
<S%G3761>Neither<s%> the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G740>loaves<s%> of the <S%G5070>four<s%> <S%G5070>thousand,<s%> and <S%G4214>how<s%> <S%G4214>many<s%> <S%G4711>baskets<s%> you <S%G2983>took<s%> up?

<S%G4459>How<s%> is it that you do not <S%G3539>understand<s%> that I spoke <S%G2036><s%> it not to you <S%G4012>concerning<s%> <S%G740>bread,<s%> that you should <S%G4337>beware<s%> of the <S%G2219>leaven<s%> of the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> and of the Sadducees? <S%G4523><s%>

<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G4920>understood<s%> they how that he <S%G2036>bade<s%> them not <S%G4337>beware<s%> of the <S%G2219>leaven<s%> of <S%G740>bread,<s%> but of the <S%G1322>doctrine<s%> of the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> and of the <S%G4523>Sadducees.<s%>

When <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3313>coasts<s%> of <S%G2542>Caesarea<s%> <S%G5375>Philippi,<s%> he <S%G2065>asked<s%> his <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G5101>Whom<s%> do <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G3004>say<s%> that I the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>man<s%> am? <S%G1511><s%>

And they <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G3588>Some<s%> <S%G3033><s%> say that you are <S%G2491>John<s%> the <S%G910>Baptist:<s%> <S%G3588>some,<s%> <S%G3033><s%> <S%G2243>Elias;<s%> and <S%G2087>others,<s%> <S%G2408>Jeremias,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of the <S%G4396>prophets.<s%>
He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, But <S%G5101>whom<s%> <S%G3004>say<s%> you that I am? <S%G1511><s%>
And <S%G4613>Simon<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said,<s%> You <S%G1488>are<s%> the <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of the <S%G2198>living<s%> <S%G2316>God.<s%>

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, <S%G3107>Blessed<s%> <S%G1488>are<s%> you, <S%G4613>Simon<s%> <S%G920>Barjona:<s%> for <S%G4561>flesh<s%> and <S%G129>blood<s%> has not revealed <S%G601><s%> it to you, but my <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is in heaven. <S%G3772><s%>

And I <S%G3004>say<s%> <S%G1161>also<s%> to you, That you <S%G1488>are<s%> <S%G4074>Peter,<s%> and on <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G4073>rock<s%> I will <S%G3618>build<s%> my <S%G1577>church;<s%> and the <S%G4439>gates<s%> of <S%G86>hell<s%> shall not <S%G2729>prevail<s%> <S%G2729>against<s%> it.

And I will <S%G1325>give<s%> to you the <S%G2807>keys<s%> of the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven:<s%> and whatever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1487><s%> you shall <S%G1210>bind<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G1093>earth<s%> shall be <S%G1210>bound<s%> in <S%G3772>heaven:<s%> and <S%G1487>whatever<s%> you shall <S%G3089>loose<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G1093>earth<s%> shall be <S%G3089>loosed<s%> in heaven. <S%G3772><s%>
<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G1291>charged<s%> he his <S%G3101>disciples<s%> that they should <S%G2036>tell<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3367>man<s%> that he was <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> the <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

From that <S%G5119>time<s%> forth <S%G756>began<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> to <S%G1166>show<s%> to his <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> how that he <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G565>go<s%> to <S%G2414>Jerusalem,<s%> and <S%G3958>suffer<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> things of the <S%G4245>elders<s%> and <S%G749>chief<s%> <S%G749>priests<s%> and <S%G1122>scribes,<s%> and be <S%G615>killed,<s%> and be <S%G1453>raised<s%> <S%G1453>again<s%> the <S%G5154>third<s%> <S%G2250>day.<s%>

<S%G2532>Then<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G4355>took<s%> him, and <S%G756>began<s%> to <S%G2008>rebuke<s%> him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> Be it <S%G2436>far<s%> from you, <S%G2962>Lord:<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> shall not be to you.

But he <S%G4762>turned,<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> to <S%G4074>Peter,<s%> <S%G5217>Get<s%> you <S%G3694>behind<s%> me, <S%G4567>Satan:<s%> you <S%G1488>are<s%> an <S%G4625>offense<s%> to me: for you <S%G5426>mind<s%> not the things that be of <S%G2316>God,<s%> but <S%G3588>those<s%> that be of men. <S%G444><s%>

<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> to his <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> <S%G1487>If<s%> any <S%G1536><s%> man <S%G2309>will<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G3694>after<s%> me, let him <S%G533>deny<s%> <S%G1438>himself,<s%> and <S%G142>take<s%> up his <S%G4716>cross,<s%> and <S%G190>follow<s%> me.

For whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> <S%G2309>will<s%> <S%G4982>save<s%> his <S%G5590>life<s%> shall <S%G622>lose<s%> it: and whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> will <S%G622>lose<s%> his <S%G5590>life<s%> for my <S%G1752>sake<s%> shall <S%G2147>find<s%> it.

For <S%G5101>what<s%> is a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G5623>profited,<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> he shall <S%G2770>gain<s%> the <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G2889>world,<s%> and <S%G2210>lose<s%> his own <S%G5590>soul?<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> shall a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G1325>give<s%> in <S%G465>exchange<s%> for his soul? <S%G5590><s%>

For the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>man<s%> shall <S%G2064>come<s%> in the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of his <S%G3962>Father<s%> with his <S%G32>angels;<s%> and <S%G5119>then<s%> he shall <S%G591>reward<s%> <S%G1538>every<s%> man <S%G2596>according<s%> to his works. <S%G4234><s%>

<S%G281>Truly<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, There be <S%G5100>some<s%> <S%G2476>standing<s%> <S%G5602>here,<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> shall not <S%G1089>taste<s%> of <S%G2288>death,<s%> <S%G2193>till<s%> they <S%G1492>see<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G2064>coming<s%> in his kingdom. <S%G932><s%>
